name: Quick Civ
description:
Quick Civ is a game where you are commanding a civilization of 3 panicked people trying to build a space ship!

TUTORIAL

(I have not been able to add a tutorial inside the game due to personal life taking too much time, Sorry for making it such a text wall!)

The game is controlled mostly by mouse
If you want to mute the game sounds you can click "M"
If you want to restart the whole game you can click "Esc" and "R"

 
On the top left you'll find a button that allows you to harvest materials and break buildings (you probably want to start with harvesting all the materials available)

 
the second button corresponds to building and assigning/un-assigning people to buildings

 
the last one is a button used to trade 1 gold for 1 additional person

  After selecting the Select Button all the Building Buttons will be shown on the bottom of the screen

by hovering on any of them you'll be able to see what the building is called and does

by clicking on any building button it shows you how many materials it needs to be built and if you have these materials it allows you to build it anywhere that's free

if you want to cancel building something that you placed but haven't built or a building you have selected, you can just right click

  if you want to destroy a building that's already built, you can press the Harvest Button and left click on the building.

After a building has been built you can assign people by left clicking on the building, or de-assign by right clicking, remember to have the Select Button selected FPM that's shown on the screen corresponds to "Food usage Per Minute" remember to build farms so your people don't starve!

One really useful thing are multipliers, you can make buildings faster by building other buildings around them, whenever you hover over a building you can see their current multiplier, note that the same type of building next to each other gives off a better multiplier!

last thing to note is that you need at least 2 people assigned to the same mine to harvest Iron and Copper, and at least 3 people to mine Gold

CHEATS

If you wanna have some fun with the game here is all the available cheats
to enable cheats HOLD the "ESC" key and click any of these buttons 3 times
Z - Gives unlimited materials
X - Everything is broken/built instantly
C - All buildings work 10x faster
V - No Hunger
B - No Saplings
